task.title: Goal: Deciding Whether to Use a GIF or PNG file
task.shortdesc: This task will aid you in selecting the GIF or PNG file format.

context.p: Have a webpage that is currently in developmnet
Have the appropriate software and hardware
Have a goal in mind for what you would like your image file to achieve.

step.cmd: Ask yourself: does this need to be supported on older browsers? If so, mark 1 for GIF.
Ask yourself: does this need to be an animated file? If so, mark 1 for GIF.
Ask yourself: is this a logo? If so, mark 1 for PNG.
Ask yourself: does this require transparency? If so, mark 1 for PNG.
Ask yourself: is this line art? If so, mark 1 for PNG.
